Class ClientAccount

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.scg.domain.ClientAccount
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Account

    public final class ClientAccount
extends java.lang.Object
implements Account
    Encapsulates the information for a billable client account.
    Author:
    Russ Moul
